attributes.action: Remove the 2 year 33bhp restriction for new riders who have passed either an IAM or RoSPA advanced test.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Statistics prove that advanced rider training greatly reduces the likelihood of accidents involving motorcyclists as well as promoting overall higher riding standards.  Advanced tests are conducted by serving police class 1 motorcycle officers and are undertaken after a period of advanced instruction by an IAM or RoSPA tutor.  Many riders taking advanced training continue as members of their local advance riding group/s, benefiting from the input of police riders & trainers along with various other road safety agencies.
